MagicNumbersPolicy.comment: Detect and flag use of magic numbers.

MaxCharacterPerLine.comment: Enforce a maximum character limit per line.

MethodExplosionInClass.comment: Limit the number of methods and parameters in a class.

MultipleClassesPerFile.comment: Avoid having multiple top-level classes or objects in a single file.

TrailingWhitespace.comment: Prevent lines from ending with whitespace.

ComplexConditionChain.comment: Limit the length of condition chains in if statements.

ExcessiveReturnStatements.comment: Limit the number of return statements in a method.

HighCyclomaticComplexity.comment: Detect methods with high cyclomatic complexity.

NestedDepth.comment: Limit the nesting depth of control structures.

RecursiveFunctionUsage.comment: Detect deep or unbounded recursive methods.

CoroutineGlobalScopeUsage.comment: Detect usage of GlobalScope in coroutines.

LargeBitmapLoading.comment: Detect loading of large bitmaps that might cause memory issues.
